items.sentence: What do you expect to find in Tom\'s basement?
What do you know about Tom that I don\'t know?
I wonder why we didn\'t get a newspaper today.
Are you looking for something to do in Boston?
You\'re supposed to be home with your parents.
You\'re the only person that can persuade Tom.
I\'ll try to convince Tom not to work so hard.
I\'m interested in doing that, but Tom isn\'t.
Tom and Mary grew up in the same neighborhood.
Tom and Mary haven\'t done their homework yet.
Let\'s try not to lose each other in this fog.
Luckily, I didn\'t have to make that decision.
Make sure Tom knows what he\'s supposed to do.
I would\'ve liked to have gone there with you.
I wouldn\'t complain about that if I were you.
Can you give me your telephone number, please?
Can you tell us what possessed you to do that?
I don\'t really care what people say about me.
Tom said he\'s going to tell us what he knows.
Tom looked as if he hadn\'t shaved for a week.
Just tell Tom he\'ll have to wait another day.
Leave me alone or I\'m going to call security.
I thought you said you wanted to learn French.
Tom was a real heartbreaker when he was young.
Tom was just happy to have someone to talk to.
I plan to stay in bed all day and read a book.
Tom apparently wants to go to Boston with you.
Tom thinks that Mary can\'t understand French.
Why would you want to buy something like that?
Would you buy one if it were a little cheaper?
I think that somebody\'s knocking on the door.
I wish I had a couple of bottles of good wine.
Let\'s just say it\'s for your own protection.
Tom wanted Mary to help him solve the problem.
Tom was shocked when he saw Mary kissing John.
Tom will be sleeping by the time we get there.
Tom winced as the nurse gave him an injection.
I told Tom that he should buy the cheaper one.
I tried to get Tom and Mary to play with John.
Tom said he didn\'t want to work here anymore.
Tom wants to know if you\'ll be ready by 2:30.
You\'re going to have to do that, aren\'t you?
You\'re hiding something from me, aren\'t you?
You\'re interested in doing that, aren\'t you?
Do you think Tom will be home on October 20th?
Tom tasted the soup and said it was delicious.
We all started hugging and kissing each other.
I spent over three thousand dollars yesterday.
Tom had a hard time making a living in Boston.
Tom had enough time to do what had to be done.
